an5.150:1.1: “Pancime, bhikkhave, dhamma samayavimuttassa bhikkhuno parihanaya samvattanti.
an5.150:1.3: Kammaramata, bhassaramata, niddaramata, indriyesu aguttadvarata, bhojane amattannuta.
an5.150:1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, panca dhamma samayavimuttassa bhikkhuno parihanaya samvattanti.
an5.150:2.1: Pancime, bhikkhave, dhamma samayavimuttassa bhikkhuno aparihanaya samvattanti.
an5.150:2.3: Na kammaramata, na bhassaramata, na niddaramata, indriyesu guttadvarata, bhojane mattannuta.
an5.150:2.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, panca dhamma samayavimuttassa bhikkhuno aparihanaya samvattanti”ti.
